name: Roam Research Dark
description: This theme has moved to Stylus. Install Stylus for either Firefox, Chrome, Opera or Cascadea for Safari and then click the following link: Install with Stylus If you find bugs you can let me know on twitter or create an issue on Github.
additional_info: v1.0.1 I decided to move this to Stylus flavoured usercss as it has a lot more features for user customisation. I won't be maintaining the uso version for Stylish anymore. Click this link to install this style with Stylus after installing the Stylus plugin mentioned above v0.1.5 - Dark-ified block embeds - {{embed: ((blockId))}} (Thanks Marcus Round for reporting) - Added better hover effect to ((blockId)) embeds v0.1.4 - Fixed right sidebar background colour.
